Some examples¶

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

Creating a dummy Pandas dataframe¶

df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(50,2))

How does the dataframe display render?¶

df.head()
0 1
0 -0.054716 -0.316925
1 1.108315 -0.940953
2 -0.630501 -1.307205
3 2.195365 -0.142174
4 0.453562 0.406250

What about plots?¶

df.plot();
